name: Flame Insignia; Lane of Luminosity
description:
The long awaited Strategy-RPG has finally arrived. 

With over 15 minutes of content, a branching narrative and an original soundtrack by prolific composer Rbrt G, Fire Emblem Flame Insignia will have you on the edge of your seat as you battle Eik's toughest foe yet...

You are Eik.

Our Man Eik

Eik, son of Rigel is a young man - but don't let this fool you. He has virtues unlike any other and is a best friend of many. We like Eik. Eik desparately wishes to take command of his father's mercenary band, The Rigel Mercenaries, from his reluctant father. To prove himself, Eik sets out on a mission, but it all goes terribly wrong...

Available Today! Play it now! Do it!!!11!

*Exclusive to Windows 10 (Sorry Miyamoto)
